name: Zodiac Ranger
description:
You are the Zodiac Ranger, protector of space-humans.

Slingshot yourself across the cosmos using gravity.  Rescue space-humans from an unpleasant fate. 

-----

Made for Weekly Game Jam #172
Theme "Catapult"

----

Any and all feedback is considered valuable.

1. What did you think of the game so far?

2. What could be changed to make it more interesting?

3. Which part did you find the most frustrating, and which the most enjoyable?

4. What was the level of difficulty? [easy, could be harder, just right, hard]

5. Did you find any glitches or problems?
